isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics Model Years 1999-2000 - SUPPLEMENTAL DIAGNOSTIC ANALYSIS - DIAGNOSING SCUFFED INJECTORS - Troubleshooting

svcproc.title: Troubleshooting
svcproc.para: A scuffed injector can be very difficult to diagnose. The best way to troubleshoot a scuffed injector is by using the EST and Master Diagnostics. Using Master Diagnostics KOER_CCT_I6.SSN:

item.para: Visualize - use the on-line graphs to compare one cylinder trace to another. Even the slightest scuffed injectors can display a significant change in pattern from a good injector.
Listen - watch the real-time graph and carefully listen to the sound characteristics of the engine.
Verify - if a DTC is set, verify that there is a significant change for that cylinder.
